title: Stone Trolls (1R314)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Tale. To play, spot Bilbo. Plays on any character. Limit 1 per character. Each time bearer skirmishes a Troll or Uruk-hai, bearer is strength +3.
Lore:	“For a couple o' pins,' says Troll, and grins, / 'I'll eat thee too, and gnaw thy shins. / A bit o' fresh meat will go down sweet!'”
Rarity:	R
